songs.title: Your Cheatin’ Heart (The Smoakstack Sessions)
songs.lyrics:
Your cheatin' heart
Will make you weep
You'll cry and cry
And try to sleep
But sleep won't come
The whole night through
Your cheatin' heart is gonna tell on you

When tears come down
Like falling rain
You'll toss around
And call my name
You'll walk the floor
The way I do
'Cause your cheatin' heart is gonna tell on you

Your cheatin' heart
Will pine some day
And crave the love
You threw away
The time will come
When you'll be blue
'Cause your cheatin' heart is gonna tell on you

When tears come down
Like falling rain
You'll toss around
And call my name
You'll walk the floor
The way I do
'Cause your cheatin' heart is gonna tell on you
Your cheatin' heart is gonna tell on you
